pr_title: Remove dependency of hono-client-adapter on hono-client

timeline.bodyText: if tenant, device or contentType are {@code null}. Additionally: tenantId inside the tenant object may be null, which would be an error here. Maybe it would be a good idea to have a dedicated type for the (authenticated) device containing tenant-ID and device-ID as mandatory properties (additional to data from RegistrationAssertion you may need for your current task).
timeline.author: b-abel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -44,13 +47,13 @@
      *         The future will be failed with a {@link org.eclipse.hono.client.ServerErrorException} if the data
      *         could not be sent. The error code contained in the exception indicates the
      *         cause of the failure.
-     * @throws NullPointerException tenant ID, device ID or contentType are {@code null}.
+     * @throws NullPointerException if tenant ID, device ID or contentType are {@code null}.

replies.bodyText: It is actually not about the authenticated device but the device that the data originates from. The right thing to do would probably be to make sure that TenantObject instances always have a tenant ID. For the time being, I will document that the method throws an IllegalArgumentException if no tenant ID is set ...
replies.author: sophokles73

timeline.bodyText: If tenantId inside the tenant object is null, it would be an error here.
timeline.author: b-abel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,14 +50,14 @@
      *         The future will be failed with a {@link org.eclipse.hono.client.ServerErrorException} if the data
      *         could not be sent. The error code contained in the exception indicates the
      *         cause of the failure.
-     * @throws NullPointerException tenant ID, device ID, qos or contentType are {@code null}.
+     * @throws NullPointerException if tenant, device, qos or contentType are {@code null}.

timeline.message:
Remove dependency of hono-client-adapter on hono-client

Factored out common exception classes into new module hono-client-core.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

Require tenantId property being set

Signed-off-by:

Make health checks and lifecycle optional to implement

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

Make clients extend Lifecycle

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

Add missing serialVersionUUID

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

Add missing serialVersionUUID

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>
